Last modfied: 2013-02-11.2: The Java Security Manager (JSM) should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.3: Tomcat should be configured to run with or without the Java Security Manager upon startup.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.4: The Tomcat server port number should be set correctly.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.5: The Tomcat Legacy JK AJP 1.3 connector should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.6: The Tomcat Legacy JK AJP 1.3  connectors should listen on the specified ports.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.7: The Tomcat Legacy HTTP/1.1 connector should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.8: The Tomcat Legacy HTTP/1.1 connectors should listen on the specified ports.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.9: The Tomcat login authentication method should be set correctly.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.10: Security roles for the Tomcat manager app should be set correctly.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.11: Security roles for the Tomcat admin app should be set correctly.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.12: Access to the Tomcat Admin app should be denied as appropriate.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.13: Access to the Tomcat Admin app should be allowed as appropriate.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.14: Access to the Tomcat manager app should be denied as appropriate.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.15: Access to the Tomcat manager app should be allowed as appropriate.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.16: The owner of the Tomcat home directory should be set correctly.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.17: The group of the Tomcat home directory should be set correctly.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.18: The permissions for the Tomcat home directory should be set correctly.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.19: The owner of the Tomcat home/conf/ directory should be set correctly.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.20: The group of the Tomcat home/conf/ directory should be set correctly.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.21: The permissions for the Tomcat home/conf/ directory should be set correctly.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.22: The owner of the tomcat-users.xml file should be set correctly.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.23: The group of the tomcat-users.xml file should be set correctly.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.24: The permissions for the tomcat-users.xml file should be set correctly.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.25: The password digest algorithm for JDBCRealm (database) connections should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.26: The JDBCRealm (database) password digest algorithm should be set correctly
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.27: The password digest algorithm for JNDIRealm (LDAP) connections should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.28: The JNDIRealm (LDAP) password digest should be configured appropriately.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.29: The Tomcat HTTP/1.1 connector should be enabled or disabled.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.30: The Tomcat HTTP/1.1 connector should be configured appropriately for the specified ports.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.31: The secure attribute should be set as appropriate for the specified Tomcat HTTP/1.1 connectors.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.32: The Tomcat JK/JK2 AJP 1.3 connector should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.33: The Tomcat JK/JK2 AJP 1.3 connector should be configured appropriately for the specified ports.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.34: The secure attribute should be set as appropriate for the specified Tomcat JK/JK2 AJP 1.3 connectors.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.35: The Tomcat Legacy JK AJP 1.3 connector should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.36: The Tomcat Legacy JK AJP 1.3 connector should be configured appropriately for the specified ports.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.37: The Tomcat WARP connector should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.38: The Tomcat WARP connector should be configured appropriately for the specified ports.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.39: JULI container level logging should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.40: The JULI FileHandler threshold level should be set correctly for the specified classes.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.41: The JULI FileHandler save directory should be configured appropriately for the specified classes
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.42: The JULI FileHandlerlog file name prefix should be set correctly for the specified classes.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.43: Granting of all permissions to Tomcat web applications should be enabled or disabled as appropriate.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.44: The example files should be installed as appropriate.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.45: The WebDAV app should be installed as appropriate.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.46: The Tomcat-docs should be installed as appropriate.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.47: The Balancer app should be installed as appropriate.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.48: The example server.xml file should be installed as appropriate.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.49: Tomcat should be run by the appropriate account
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.50: Tomcat should be run with the appropriate group membership.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.51: Tomcat web application JVM property read permissions should be set correctly for the specified properties.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.52: Tomcat web application JVM property write permissions should be set correctly for the specified properties.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.53: Tomcat should be run by the appropriate account
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.54: Tomcat should be run with the appropriate group membership.
Last modfied: 2013-02-11.55: The Tomcat user account should be locked or unlocked as appropriate.
